verses.roman:
śiṣya, praśiṣya, āra upaśiṣya-gaṇa
jagat vyāpila tāra nāhika gaṇana

synonyms: śiṣya—disciples; praśiṣya—granddisciples; ara—and; upaśiṣya-gaṇa—admirers; jagat—the whole world; vyāpila—spread; tāra—of that; nāhika—there is none; gaṇana—enumeration.
translation: Thus the disciples and the granddisciples and their admirers spread throughout the entire world, and it is not possible to enumerate them all.
